label: deductionAmount
comment: A monetary value of the deduction from this trade related tax, levy or duty.
A monetary value to be deducted from this trade allowance charge.

rangeIncludes.comment: A number of monetary units specified in a currency where the unit of the currency is explicit or implied.

domainIncludes.comment: A component of pricing, such as an allowance or charge for trade purposes.
A trade related fiscal levy or duty.
